name: Swords & Sorcery
overview: Swords and Sorcery is a fantasy text adventure game in which the player is a hero who must attempt to rescue an elfin princess from a necromancer's dungeon. The player must find the dungeon in a dark forest, navigate it and find the princess and help her escape. In addition to rescuing the princess the player must also collect enough gold along the way. Input is mostly in the form of yes or no options.
